shared.model.board

Class Hex

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.board.Hex

  • public class Hex
extends java.lang.Object
    The Hex class is used to store what kind of resource can be gained through it, what roll value is necessary to gain the resources, and whether the resources will be stolen by the robber Operations are provided for (1) checking for the robber, and placing him or taking him away from the hex
    (3) Getting and setting the hexType
    (4) Retrieving the Hex location
